articles.description: India's richest man is bringing 7-Eleven to the country, adding the convenience store chain to a sprawling business empire that spans energy, chemicals, retail and telecommunications.
articles.content: Hong Kong (CNN Business)India's richest man is bringing 7-Eleven to the country, adding the convenience store chain to a sprawling business empire that spans energy, chemicals, retail and telecommuni… [+2513 chars]

articles.title: Why are natural gas prices so high? | CNBC Explains - CNBC International
articles.description: Millions of households in Europe could be facing high gas bills this winter as the price of natural gas skyrockets across the continent. -----Subscribe to us...
